sections.title: Dashboard Overview
sections.script:
Welcome to Administrator Training. This module covers the Compliance Dashboard in depth - your central command center for platform compliance.

**Dashboard Purpose:**
The Compliance Dashboard provides real-time visibility into:
- Content compliance status
- User verification status
- Regulatory compliance metrics
- Incident tracking
- Risk indicators

**Access Levels:**
- Moderator View: Limited to assigned queues
- Admin View: Full platform visibility
- Compliance Officer View: Full access + reporting
- Executive View: Summary metrics

**Dashboard Structure:**
The dashboard has 6 main tabs:
1. **Overview** - System health at a glance
2. **CSAM Detection** - Hash matching and detection stats
3. **Age Verification** - Verification by jurisdiction
4. **Payment Compliance** - Risk distribution and violations
5. **GDPR/DSA** - Request management and deadlines
6. **Trafficking** - Risk assessment and monitoring

**Real-Time Updates:**
- Data refreshes every 60 seconds
- Critical alerts push immediately
- Trend graphs update hourly
- Full recalculation runs daily

sections.title: Tab 1: Overview & System Health
sections.script:
The Overview tab shows platform-wide compliance health.

**Key Metrics:**

**Compliance Score (0-100):**
Aggregate score based on:
- CSAM detection effectiveness
- Age verification completion rate
- Content review accuracy
- Deadline compliance
- Incident response time

Target: 95+
Warning: Below 85
Critical: Below 70

**Active Incidents:**
Count of open compliance incidents:
- Critical (CSAM, trafficking)
- High (major violations)
- Medium (policy violations)
- Low (minor issues)

**Pending Items:**
- GDPR requests awaiting response
- DSA complaints in queue
- Appeals pending review
- Content flags pending

**7-Day Trends:**
Graphs showing:
- New content volume
- Flag rate (% flagged)
- Violation rate (% violations)
- Response time trends

**System Status:**
- Detection systems (online/offline)
- Verification systems status
- Queue health
- API status

**Action Items:**
Automatically prioritized list of:
- Overdue deadlines
- Critical escalations
- Pending approvals

sections.title: Tab 2: CSAM Detection
sections.script:
The CSAM Detection tab monitors hash matching effectiveness.

**Detection Statistics:**

**Daily/Weekly/Monthly Metrics:**
- Total content scanned
- Hash matches detected
- False positive rate
- Report filing rate

**Detection Sources:**
- PhotoDNA matches
- PDQ matches
- AI detection flags
- User reports

**NCMEC Reporting:**
- Reports filed (count)
- Average time to file
- Compliance rate (within 24 hours)
- Open reports awaiting confirmation

**Hash Database Status:**
- Last update time
- Hash count
- Sources active
- Sync status

**Account Actions:**
- Accounts suspended for CSAM
- Accounts reported to LE
- Related accounts identified

**Important Metrics to Monitor:**
- Detection rate should be consistent
- Sudden drops may indicate system issues
- Spikes may indicate attack or exploitation
- False positive rate should stay under 0.1%

**Alerts:**
- Immediate: Any CSAM detection
- Warning: Detection system offline
- Critical: NCMEC deadline approaching

sections.title: Tab 3: Age Verification
sections.script:
Age Verification tab tracks verification status by jurisdiction.

**Verification Overview:**

**By Jurisdiction:**
Track compliance with specific laws:
- UK (Online Safety Act): % verified
- US states: Compliance by state
- EU: General verification rate
- Other: Global statistics

**Verification Methods:**
Breakdown by method:
- VerifyMy (recommended)
- ID upload
- Credit card
- AI estimation
- Pending verification

**Completion Rates:**
- Users starting verification
- Users completing verification
- Failure rate
- Retry rate

**Geographic Distribution:**
Map showing:
- Users by jurisdiction
- Compliance status by region
- Pending verifications

**7-Year Retention Tracking:**
- Records approaching expiration
- Records requiring renewal
- Archived records count

**Creator Verification:**
- Creators fully verified
- Creators pending
- Enhanced verification status

**Issues to Watch:**
- Low completion rates in required jurisdictions
- High failure rates (system issues?)
- Jurisdiction gaps
- Approaching retention deadlines

sections.title: Tab 4: Payment Compliance
sections.script:
Payment Compliance tab monitors content against processor requirements.

**Risk Score Distribution:**
Chart showing content by risk level:
- 0-39 (Green): Low risk content
- 40-59 (Yellow): Flagged content
- 60-79 (Orange): High attention
- 80-100 (Red): Blocked

**Violation Categories:**
Breakdown by prohibited category:
- Appearing minor
- Incest/family
- Non-consent
- Violence
- Other categories

**Strike Status:**
Creator strike tracking:
- Accounts with 0 strikes
- Accounts with 1 strike
- Accounts with 2 strikes
- Accounts banned (3 strikes)

**Moderation Metrics:**
- Content reviewed (volume)
- Average review time
- Accuracy rate
- Appeal rate
- Overturn rate

**Quarterly Processor Reports:**
- Report generation status
- Last report submitted
- Next report due
- Metrics summary

**Trends:**
- Violation rate over time
- Category trends
- Creator education effectiveness

**Alerts:**
- Spike in violations
- High-volume creator issues
- Processor audit scheduled

sections.title: Tabs 5-6: GDPR/DSA and Trafficking
sections.script:
**Tab 5: GDPR/DSA Management**

**GDPR Requests:**
- Open requests by type (access, erasure, etc.)
- Requests approaching deadline
- Completed requests (this period)
- Average response time

**DSA Complaints:**
- Open complaints
- Approaching 14-day deadline
- Completed complaints
- ODR cases active

**Deadline Calendar:**
Visual calendar showing:
- Upcoming deadlines
- Color-coded by urgency
- Assigned handler
- Status

**Response Templates:**
Quick access to:
- Standard response templates
- Denial templates with exceptions
- Statement of Reasons templates

**Transparency Reporting:**
- Data for quarterly reports
- Content removal stats
- Complaint stats
- Automated report generation

**Tab 6: Trafficking Monitoring**

**Risk Levels:**
Accounts by trafficking risk:
- Low (monitored)
- Medium (flagged)
- High (escalated)
- Critical (action taken)

**Indicator Trends:**
- Most common indicators
- Emerging patterns
- Geographic clusters

**Actions Taken:**
- Accounts investigated
- FBI reports filed
- Accounts suspended
- False alarms cleared

**Hotline Referrals:**
- Referrals to trafficking hotline
- Outcomes (when known)

**Training Effectiveness:**
- Moderator detection rate
- Creator education completion

alertTypes.examples: CSAM detection, system offline, deadline missed
Trafficking escalation, processor audit, large violation spike

questions.question: What is the target Compliance Score?
questions.explanation: Target compliance score is 95+. Below 85 triggers warning, below 70 is critical.

questions.question: How often does dashboard data refresh?
questions.explanation: Dashboard data refreshes every 60 seconds, with critical alerts pushing immediately.

questions.question: Which risk score range is automatically blocked?
questions.explanation: Content with risk score 80-100 is automatically blocked pending review.

questions.question: What is an acceptable false positive rate for CSAM detection?
questions.explanation: False positive rate should stay under 0.1% to avoid wrongly flagging legitimate content.

questions.question: How many main tabs does the Compliance Dashboard have?
questions.explanation: The dashboard has 6 main tabs: Overview, CSAM Detection, Age Verification, Payment Compliance, GDPR/DSA, and Trafficking.
